item.title: “I Know That My Redeemer Liveth”
item.description:
“I Know That My Redeemer Liveth” by President Joseph Fielding Smith, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 141st Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1971
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
